code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient with moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear and moderate pain and discharge in ear. he has had several such episodes over past 4 months. pt is a 22 yr old male student. he denies smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 180 cm, Weight 102.9 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famcyclovir - 500 mg 3 x per day, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:pt presents with Heart. he is a m student aged 22 ys. o:Height 180 cm, Weight 102.8 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

s:patient describes recurrent moderate pain and discharge in ear over the past month. The pt reports moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments. he is a white M student aged 23 ys. o:Height 181 cm, Weight 106.2 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 0.4 mL 3-4 drops in both ears 2-3 x per day, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:23 YO white m student indicates Heart. denies any smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 181 cm, Weight 105.9 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered Chest X-Ray.
